name: Cubic Defence
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 50: Delay The Inevitable 

Instructions & Controls

Right Click to move the player to your Position. You can click anywhere on the grass, but cannot click onto the roads, you can still pass over them, but you can't stand on them.

Left click on trees and rocks to collect resources when you are within range. Collecting resources is essential for crafting turrets.

Place turrets to defend vs the infinite waves of enemies and Delay your Inevitable doom.

Defend vs Infinite waves of enemies to increase your score and defend from your Inevitable doom.

At the end of the game a Score will be shown, feel free to share and post your high-scores in the comments!
